import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Trash2, Minus, Plus, ArrowLeft, CreditCard, Truck } from 'lucide-react'; interface CartItem { id: number; name: string; price: number; image: string; quantity: number; category: string; } const Cart: React.FC = () => { // Mock cart data - in a real app this would come from context or state management const [cartItems, setCartItems] = useState([ { id: 1, name: "iPhone 15 Pro Max Charger", price: 29.99, image: "/images/iphone-charger.jpg", quantity: 2, category: "Chargers" }, { id: 2, name: "AirPods Pro 2nd Generation", price: 249.99, image: "/images/airpods-pro.jpg", quantity: 1, category: "Audio" } ]); const updateQuantity = (itemId: number, newQuantity: number) => { if (newQuantity <= 0) { removeItem(itemId); return; } setCartItems(prev => prev.map(item => item.id === itemId ? { ...item, quantity: newQuantity } : item ) ); }; const removeItem = (itemId: number) => { setCartItems(prev => prev.filter(item => item.id !== itemId)); }; const subtotal = cartItems.reduce((sum, item) => sum + (item.price * item.quantity), 0); const shipping = subtotal > 50 ? 0 : 9.99; const tax = subtotal * 0.08; // 8% tax const total = subtotal + shipping + tax; if (cartItems.length === 0) { return (

Your cart is empty

Looks like you haven't added any products to your cart yet.

Start Shopping
); } return (
{/* Header */}

Shopping Cart

{cartItems.reduce((sum, item) => sum + item.quantity, 0)} item(s) in your cart

{/* Cart Items */}

Cart Items

{cartItems.map((item) => (
{ const target = e.target as HTMLImageElement; target.src = 'https://via.placeholder.com/80x80?text=Product'; }} />

{item.name}

{item.category}

Quantity:
{item.quantity}

${(item.price * item.quantity).toFixed(2)}

${item.price.toFixed(2)} each

))}
{/* Order Summary */}

Order Summary

Subtotal ${subtotal.toFixed(2)}
Shipping {shipping === 0 ? 'Free' : `$${shipping.toFixed(2)}`}
Tax ${tax.toFixed(2)}
Total ${total.toFixed(2)}
{/* Shipping Info */}
Free Shipping

Free shipping on orders over $50. Orders under $50 ship for $9.99.

{/* Checkout Button */}
Continue Shopping
{/* Additional Info */}

Free Shipping

On orders over $50

Secure Payment

100% secure checkout

Easy Returns

30-day return policy

); }; export default Cart;
